title: Dispatch Security for an Incident
description: An usher uses their radio to report a verbal altercation between two guests in a specific section.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the report and confirm the location of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the location (e.g., Section 112, Row G) from the usher.

tasks.description: Identify the nearest two security guards on the security dispatch map.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the two closest available guards.

tasks.description: Dispatch the two guards to the location to de-escalate the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the dispatch order to the guards' devices.

tasks.description: Log the incident in the security log, including the report time, location, and responding units.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new incident record in the security system.
